languages.text: Развалина и его свита более не представляют угрозы для Детей Искупления. Пришло время вернуться в убежище выживших и решить их судьбу.

traits.locale_text: Крушитель и его свита более не представляют угрозы для Детей Искупления. Пришло время вернуться в убежище выживших и решить их судьбу.

languages.text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.
languages.original_text: Развалина и его свита более не представляют угрозы для Детей Искупления. Пришло время вернуться в убежище выживших и решить их судьбу.

traits.locale_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.
The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.
The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.
The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

languages.text: 凌虐者与它的随从已经无法再对救赎之子构成威胁了。是时候返回那些幸存者的庇护所，决定他们的命运了。
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: 凌虐者与它的随从已经无法再对救赎之子构成威胁了。是时候返回那些幸存者的庇护所，决定他们的命运了。

languages.text: ラックとその取り巻きは、チルドレン・オブ・リデンプションにとってはもはや脅威ではない。生存者の避難所に戻り、命運を決める時が来た。
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: ラックとその取り巻きは、チルドレン・オブ・リデンプションにとってはもはや脅威ではない。生存者の避難所に戻り、命運を決める時が来た。

languages.text: El Atormentado y su séquito ya no suponen una amenaza para los Hijos de la Redención. Ha llegado el momento de volver al refugio de los supervivientes y dictar su destino.
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: El Atormentado y su séquito ya no suponen una amenaza para los Hijos de la Redención. Ha llegado el momento de volver al refugio de los supervivientes y dictar su destino.

languages.text: Der Folterer und sein Gefolge sind für die Kinder der Erlösung keine Bedrohung mehr. Es wird Zeit, zur Zuflucht der Überlebenden zurückzukehren und über ihr Schicksal zu befinden.
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: Der Folterer und sein Gefolge sind für die Kinder der Erlösung keine Bedrohung mehr. Es wird Zeit, zur Zuflucht der Überlebenden zurückzukehren und über ihr Schicksal zu befinden.

languages.text: La Gorgone et son entourage ne représentent plus une menace pour les Enfants de la Rédemption. Le moment est venu de revenir au refuge des survivants et de décider de leur sort.
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: La Gorgone et son entourage ne représentent plus une menace pour les Enfants de la Rédemption. Le moment est venu de revenir au refuge des survivants et de décider de leur sort.

languages.text: Harap ve beraberindekiler, artık Kefaretin Çocukları'na tehdit teşkil etmiyor. Hayatta kalanların sığınağına dönme ve onlara ne olacağına karar verme zamanı.
languages.original_text: The Wrack and his entourage no longer pose a threat to the Children of Redemption. The time has come to return to the survivors' shelter and decide their fate.

traits.locale_text: Harap ve beraberindekiler artık Kefaretin Çocukları için bir tehdit teşkil etmiyor. Hayatta kalanların sığınağına dönme ve onlara ne olacağına karar verme zamanı.
